QuestData.Title: One Magical, Flying Kingdom's Trash...
QuestData.Description: Before we enter into a business relationship, I am required by the terms of my rehabilitation program to inform you that I am a recovering potion addict.$B$BThere, now that THAT's out of the way, let's talk portals!$B$BYou see, the big portals in the cities - the ones running all day and night - leak tons of magical energy. It crystallizes around the edges and is generally regarded as trash.$B$BBut I noticed during my, uh... hiatus in the sewers of Dalaran, that these shards still had power.$B$BInterested?
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Barnaby Fletcher to learn more about Portal Shards.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Barnaby Fletcher in Halfhill Market.
